title: Looking for someone to duo with
body:
Hello, I am looking for someone to duo with in oce server. 
I went to placement matches in silver 2 and climbed to silver 1 but then went all the way down to silver 5. 
Climbed back to silver 1 then went back to silver 4 again.
I would like to reach gold by the end of this season but I feel like that i can't do this alone. 
I think I need at least one person that I can rely on so if there is any good players (smurf or not i don't care but a player with a good game knowledge is preferred) willing to help me would be really appreciated.

My summoner name is Apex1997

Thanks
